bike.description: 6061 aluminum, compact sloping top tube frame design, SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered head tube, 34.9 seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger
bike.paint_description: Pearl White/Victory Blue or Ano Palladium/Monterey Red

components.description: Aero straight blade road fork, 1.5 aluminum crown, aluminum blades with chromoly steerer
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims with GSW sidewall, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Shimano Claris RD-2400 rear and Shimano Claris FD-2400 front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Claris ST-2400 Dual Control STI, 16-Speed
Touring platform style, full alloy with toe clips
Tektro R317 alloy dual pivot calipers with adjustable pads and Shimano ST-2300 STI brake levers
Jamis suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Jamis Road, micro-adjust, 31.6 x 350mm with alloy clamp
Jamis Road Sport with SL top and satin steel rails
